description: Comprehensive health care services for individuals and families, including preventive care and treatment of common illnesses.
Dedicated health services for infants, children, and adolescents, ensuring proper growth and development.
Heart care services including diagnosis, treatment, and management of cardiovascular diseases.
Skin care and treatment of skin-related conditions such as acne, eczema, and skin cancer.
Treatment of musculoskeletal issues including joint pain, fractures, and sports injuries.
Diagnostic imaging services including X-rays, MRIs, CT scans, and ultrasounds.
24/7 emergency care for critical and urgent medical situations.
On-site lab tests for accurate diagnosis, including blood tests and screenings.
